name: Map Pack: Herbs & Hemlock Store
description:
Welcome to Herbs & Hemlock adventurer. We have everything you need in terms of potions, poultices, and dare I say... Poisons.

Included in this map pack you'll find the following for use in your games:

  • One page (Pathfinder 2) description of Harrowhall Manor along with a new, unique, Haunt.
  • Three maps, one without markings, one with squares, and one with dots that allow you to use Herbs & Hemlock in a combat scenario. The map sizes are 1500 x 978 px or bigger.

For Creators:

This map pack comes with a license so that you can use the maps in your own products, without the need for royalties. 2 licenses are included, a long-form one, and a short-form one that boils it all down.
